get.description: List the operations for the provider

AuthoringStatus.description: The authoring status for landing zone configuration workflow.

values.name: Authoring
values.description: Default status set automatically on create request. In this status the landing zone configuration can be updated.

values.name: ReadyForUse
values.description: This status is set when the configuration changes are done and the configuration is ready for generating the landing zone code.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: This status is set when the landing zone configuration is no longer in use.

FirewallCreationOptions.description: The input values for creating or using an existing firewall resource.

values.name: None
values.description: Value choosen when a user does not want to create a firewall resource.

values.name: Standard
values.description: Value choosen when a user wants to create a firewall resource of standard SKU.

values.name: Premium
values.description: Value choosen when a user wants to create a firewall resource of premium SKU.

values.name: UseExisting
values.description: Value choosen when a user wants to use an existing firewall resource.

iacOutputOption.description: The options that code can be generated in

blobUrl.description: The blob url where generated landing zone is stored

IaCOutputOptions.description: The format in which the landing zone code can be generated.

values.name: Bicep
values.description: Value choosen when the customer wants to generate the code in bicep.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

authoringStatus.description: The status for the landing zone configuration workflow.

existingTopLevelMgParentId.description: Optional parent for management group hierarchy, used as intermediate root management group parent, if specified. If empty, default, will deploy beneath tenant toot management group.

deploymentPrefix.description: The prefix that will be added to all resources created by this deployment.

deploymentSuffix.description: The suffix that will be added to management group name.

topLevelMgDisplayName.description: The top level management group display name.

organization.description: The name of the country/region or agency SLZ is being deployed for.

ddosProtectionCreationOption.description: Yes to deploy DDoS, otherwise no. To provide an existing DDoS protection plan select existing.

existingDdosProtectionId.description: Existing ddos protection fully qualified plan id.

logAnalyticsWorkspaceCreationOption.description: yes to deploy log Analytics workspace, otherwise no. To provide an existing log Analytics workspace select existing.

existingLogAnalyticsWorkspaceId.description: The fully qualified id for the Log Analytics workspace that was created to centralize log ingest.

tags.description: Array of tag objects in format of {'name':'a tag name', 'value':'a tag value'}

firewallCreationOption.description: To deploy firewall choose the standard/premium based on the desired SKU. None for no firewall and existing to choose a pre existing one.

firewallSubnetCidrBlock.description: Azure firewall subnet. IPv4 CIDR block.

logRetentionInDays.description: Set how long logs are retained for, in days. Minimum length is 30 and maximum is 730

deploymentLocation.description: Location to run deployment(s) from the list of Azure Regions

hubNetworkCidrBlock.description: The address space for the VNET. IPv4 CIDR.

azureBastionCreationOption.description: To deploy the Bastion service choose the yes, no otherwise. For existing bastion service existing.

existingAzureBastionId.description: Existing azure bastion fully qualified id.

azureBastionSubnetCidrBlock.description: Azure bastion subnet. IP v4 CIDR block
